text: realize that the more weight you lose
the harder it gets to lose some more so
a lot of times you get people that start
off on these fitness kicks and
especially runners you see them jack up
the miles and they go and then go in to

losing the weight and they can't pair
why and why am I not making more

starting to adjust to try to hang on to
what you have the other problem too is
most people that do that actually eat
too little when it comes to calories
it's funny because when you start to
starve yourself and you're not matching
your calories to your activity your
metabolism is gonna do the one thing
that it's designed to do which is
protect you and it's gonna slow down to
help you maintain weight not lose weight
so if you really want to try to keep
your metabolism up and impact that that
fat loss over time it's important to
actually eat enough and what we often
find when you look at the dietary intake
of these people is that they're usually
deficient in protein and the other thing
too is they forget to include a really
important part of the exercise program
which is lifting weights runners like to
run but the thing is we know that
lifting weights also helps with their

mass and function and over time you find
that you do continue to lose a certain
